SEARCH

Class Ebook

java.lang.Object
MediaItem
Ebook
public class Ebook extends MediaItem
Represents an electronic book (Ebook) in a media library system, extending the abstract MediaItem class. This class provides additional attributes specific to ebooks, such as file format and file size. It validates these attributes during object creation and offers methods to access ebook-specific information. Ebooks are supported in a predefined set of file formats: epub, PDF, and mobi.
Author:
Lindokuhle Dubazane, Annah Masombuka, Given Sitole

  • Constructor Details

    • Ebook

      Ebook(String author, String title, int length, int yearReleased, int totalItems, String fileFormat, double sizeMb)
      Constructs a new Ebook with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      author - the author of the ebook
      title - the title of the ebook
      length - the number of pages in the ebook
      yearReleased - the year the ebook was published
      totalItems - the total number of ebook copies available
      fileFormat - the file format of the ebook
      sizeMb - the size of the ebook file in megabytes

  • Method Details

    • getFileFormat

      public final String getFileFormat()
      Returns the file format of the ebook.
      Returns:
      the ebook's file format (e.g., "epub", "pdf", "mobi")

    • getSizeMb

      public final double getSizeMb()
      Returns the size of the ebook file.
      Returns:
      the ebook file size in megabytes

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Provides a string representation of the Ebook.
      Overrides:
      toString in class MediaItem
      Returns:
      a formatted string containing ebook-specific details and the parent MediaItem's toString representation

    • displayDetails

      public void displayDetails()
      Displays detailed information about the ebook. This method first calls the parent class's displayDetails method, then prints additional ebook-specific information including title, author, file format, file size, and release year.
      Overrides:
      displayDetails in class MediaItem
